entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProjectSystemProjectOptionsProcessor does not set CompilationOptions when given empty command line #78423
  • IDE0055 false positive for C# 14 extension methods #78422
  • Decouple Metadata as Source from the LSP miscellaneous files workspace #78421
  • IDE0022 for non-single line methods (comments) #78419
  • Extension everything public metadata types break .NET package validation #78416
  • Unable to use extension everything to write a generic Cast that works with LINQ query comprehensions #78415
  • Correctness CI failing with roslyn-analyzers documentation errors #78414
  • new extension syntax crushes build with certain event syntax #78413
  • VS2022 Incorrectly Modifies Event Handler Return Type #78409
  • Provide overloads for IncrementalValue[s]Provider.Combine accepting more than 2 providers #78408

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-10601.163 #78410
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10601.69 #78406

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable analyzer doc validation in correctness runs #78420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure we log what the HTTP error message is if we get a failure #78418
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Debug correctnss #78417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disallow shebang in project-based programs #78411
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ignored Directives

Merged

  • Skip generate analyzer documentation to unblock ci #78412
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move runtime async method validation into initial binding #78310
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Switch to non-scouting queue to unblock CI #78407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Revert back to scouting queue #78424
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Repack RoslynAnalyzer packages separately from Roslyn packages #78404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix syntax tree creation when modifying source generated documents #78343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • File based programs IDE support #78208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extract out an interface for our LSP miscellaneous files workspace #78401
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • A bit of cleanup to StopWatchingReference's code to help diagnose an issue #78394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure hover markdown for supported platforms uses non-breaking spaces for indentation #78405
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Make compiler detection more resilient #78402
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Provide overloads for IncrementalValue[s]Provider.Combine #78316
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Adjust LocalBinderFactory.VisitInvocationExpression to handle attributes on extension parameter #78399
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add workflow to manage 'collecting-feedback' labeled issues #78296
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Precursor work to merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures. #78308
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
